page.title: 10SELBY FIRE STATION
page.content: The{officer in charge}is Mr.Somers.The {brigade}gave a show of a ladder drill, tower drill & a hose drill. As quickly as possible they got to work. Before you knew it they got all the pipes out & hoses, suction tubes & ground sprays We put our fingers up the hole where the water comes out. Then we looked around the{fire engine.}They have 2 engines at{SELBY FIRE STATION,}each well equipped for serious{FIRES.}At the back of the engine are three hose pipe slots. Inside the compartments are extra suits & hose pipes, foam equipment and branches. In the fire men's seats are cylinders of oxygen. On top of the engine are ladders, one short and an extra long one and an extension. We asked Mr. Somers if he had ever saved an animal. He told us a donkey. He also saved 2 people in a car from an icy river.
